investigator.description: Email of person pursuing the data analysis. The string may contain a list of emails, which should then be separated by semicolons

input_Datasets.description: Array of input dataset identifiers used in producing the derived dataset. Ideally these are the global identifier to existing datasets inside this or federated data catalogs

usedSoftware.description: A list of links to software repositories which uniquely identifies the software used and the version for yielding the derived data

jobParameters.description: The creation process of the drived data will usually depend on input job parameters. The full structure of these input parameters are stored here

jobLogData.description: The output job logfile. Keep the size of this log data well below 15 MB

scientificMetadata.description: JSON object containing the scientific meta data
